pages.text: Vaults consist of multiple Layouts that gradually show up while you continue your Journey as a $(#033dfc)Vault Hunter$().

pages.title: Diamond Layout
pages.text: The first layout you will come across is the $(#033dfc)Diamond layout$(), which shapes Vaults in a diamond form. This layout will accompany you from your very first Vaults, to your very last ones.

pages.title: Square Layout
pages.text: Starting from $(#033dfc)Level 50$(), you will be greeted with the $(#033dfc)Square layout layout$(), which shapes Vaults in a Square form. It is one of the easiest to navigate through, but has the most rooms out of all the layouts!

pages.title: Circle Layout
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Level 100$() onwards, the $(#033dfc)Circle layout will be introduced$(), which shapes Vaults in a Circle shape. This layout is balanced inbetween the $(#033dfc)Diamond$() & the $(#033dfc)Square$() Layout in terms of rooms.

pages.title: Triangle Layout
pages.text: Similar to the $(#033dfc)Circle Layout$(), the $(#033dfc)Triangle Layout$() will appear, starting from $(#033dfc)Level 100$() and shapes Vaults in a Triangle shape. It is considered to be the most difficult layout to navigate through.

pages.title: Spiral Layout
pages.text: The $(#033dfc)Spiral layout$() is a unique layout which only appears in $(l:the_vault/cake_vault)Cake Vaults$(). Rooms are generated per clicked cake and will not connect hallways to already generated Rooms.
